attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown was not voted in, And it is within the British people to elect a Primeminister that we think is suitable
for our country. We the people have the option for the government we want to vote in.It is wrong for the Queen to even instate Gordon Brown without a public vote, All i ask of the British people is to vote the Labour party out.The Labour party is nearly in its Eleventh year and they have done nothing but cause serious inflation of taxes and lose our personal details on disks and laptops. something has to be done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
